ActMinistries and Ministers of State Act
PrecisOrder assigning the Hon. PAUL DeVILLERS, a Minister of State, to be known as Secretary of State (Amateur Sport and Fitness) and Deputy Leader of the Government in the House of Commons, to assist the Minister of Canadian Heritage, the Minister of Health and the Leader of the Government in the House of Commons in the discharge of their responsibilities, effective June 20, 2003.
RegistrationRegistration: SI/ 2003-0132 Publication Date: 2003-07-02
